This file will become your README and also the index of your documentation.

Install

pip install rfpfolio

How to use

Some code examples:

{% raw %} 
tst_src = rfp.PriceSource('testdata/2017-Apr')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
price_data = tst_src.loadAllAdjustedPrices(['SPY', 'IEI', 'GLD'])
price_data.head()
SPY IEI GLD
Date
